author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Support multiple (up to 4) simultaneous connections to our server.
(serf_connection_t): Cache address; create an array of connections (max of
4 hardcoded in serf_open for now), indicate how many active connections we
(svn_ra_serf__open): Store our address in context and create an array of
(svn_ra_serf__get_log): Pass connection to retrieve_props; send report on
(handle_fetch): Pass in our connection if we have to requeue.
(fetch_file): Pick a connection and deliver this GET/PROPFIND pair to it;
(end_report): Deliver our directory PROPFIND to the selected connection.
(finish_report): Pass connection to retrieve_props; Create our three
(handle_propfind): If we have to requeue, send it on the same connection.
(deliver_props): Take in a new connection parameter and send our request
(retrieve_props): Take in conn parameter and give to deliver_props.
send report on our base connection.
